00023 void Lua_wrapper::Init(Game* game)
00024 {
00025         state = lua_open();
00026         luaL_openlibs(state);
00027         gamemap[state] = game;
00028 }

00031 void Lua_wrapper::Deinit()
00032 {
00033         lua_close(state);
00034         state=NULL;
00035 }

00038 void Lua_wrapper::Load_script(std::string filename, bool call)
00039 {
00040         if (luaL_loadfile(state, filename.c_str()) == 0)
00041         {
00042                 if (call)
00043                 {
00044                         int errors = lua_pcall(state, 0, 0, 0);
00045                         if (errors)
00046                         {
00047                                 std::cout << lua_tostring(state, -1) << std::endl;
00048                         }
00049                 }
00050         }
00051         else
00052         {
00053                 std::cout << filename <<" failed to execute" << std::endl;
00054         }
00055 }

00057 
00058 void Lua_wrapper::Call(std::string function, void* caller)
00059 {
00060         if ("" == function)
00061                 return;
00062 
00063         lua_getglobal(state, function.c_str());
00064         lua_pushlightuserdata(state, caller);
00065         int errors = lua_pcall(state, 1, 0, 0);
00066 
00067         if (errors)
00068         {
00069                 std::cout << lua_tostring(state, -1) << std::endl;
00070         }
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 lua_State* Lua_wrapper::Prepare(std::string function, void* caller)
00075 {
00076         if ("" == function)
00077                 return NULL;
00078 
00079         lua_getglobal(state, function.c_str());
00080         lua_pushlightuserdata(state, caller);
00081         return state;
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 void Lua_wrapper::Call(int args)
00086 {
00087         int errors = lua_pcall(state, args+1, 0, 0);
00088 
00089         if (errors)
00090         {
00091                 Monday_out(SUGGESTION_LEVEL, std::cout, "*SUGGESTION: Lua_wrapp::Call() has an invalid state: %s\n", lua_tostring(state, -1));
00092                 std::cout << lua_tostring(state, -1) << std::endl;
00093         }
00094 }

00103 Game* Lua_wrapper::Get_game(lua_State* state)
00104 {
00105         mon_assert(gamemap.find(state) != gamemap.end());
00106         return gamemap[state];
00107 }
